name: Jollibee
description: Famous for Chickenjoy, Jolly Spaghetti, and Peach Mango Pie. A beloved Filipino fast-food chain known for its joyful flavors.

name: McDonald's
description: Serving burgers, fries, chicken meals, and desserts. Popular for its classic menu and quick service.

name: KFC
description: Crispy fried chicken, buckets, and signature gravy. Loved for its savory fried chicken and hearty sides.

name: Shakey's
description: Pizza, chicken, mojos, and family meals. Perfect for gatherings and casual dining with friends and family.

name: Subway
description: Fresh sandwiches and healthy meal options. Offers customizable subs and salads for a lighter, nutritious meal.

name: Mang Inasal
description: Famous for unlimited rice, grilled chicken, and traditional Filipino flavors. A favorite for quick, hearty Filipino meals.

name: Greenwich Pizza
description: Serving delicious pizzas, pasta, and chicken meals. Perfect for family dinners or casual snacks.

name: Max's Restaurant
description: Known for fried chicken and classic Filipino dishes. A long-standing Filipino restaurant with home-style meals.

name: BonChon
description: Crispy Korean-style fried chicken and rice meals. Loved for its unique sauce flavors and crunchy chicken.

name: Andok's
description: Famous for roasted chicken, liempo, and local Filipino dishes. Affordable meals perfect for everyday dining.

name: Tokyo Tokyo
description: Japanese-inspired meals, including bento, sushi, and tempura. Offers tasty, quick Japanese dishes for delivery.

name: Yellow Cab Pizza
description: Thin-crust pizzas, pasta, and chicken wings. A modern pizzeria favorite for flavorful meals and sharing plates.

name: Army Navy
description: Burgers, burritos, fries, and milkshakes. Known for hearty American comfort food in a casual setting.

name: Conti's
description: Cakes, pastries, pasta, and full meals. A great choice for celebrations and sweet treats.

name: Cafe Mary Grace
description: Homemade-style cakes, pasta, and Filipino comfort meals. Cozy ambiance and quality dishes make it a favorite café.

name: Racks
description: Ribs, steaks, and pasta dishes. Perfect for meat lovers and group meals with hearty portions.

name: Romulo Café
description: Traditional Filipino cuisine with modern touches. Serves dishes inspired by heritage recipes and flavors.

name: Pancake House
description: Pancakes, breakfast meals, and all-day comfort food. A classic spot for breakfast lovers and casual dining.

name: Hap Chan
description: Chinese-Filipino dishes including noodles, dim sum, and rice meals. Known for flavorful dishes at reasonable prices.

name: Casa Reyes
description: Authentic Filipino dishes with a modern touch. Known for its flavorful rice meals, grilled meats, and home-style specialties.
